articles.author: Ariel Zilber
articles.title: Inflation still causing pain for Americans — with parents hit harder: Fed survey - New York Post
articles.description: Inflation remained the top financial concern, the report said. Sixty-five percent of adults said high prices had made their situations worse.
articles.content:
Parents are feeling the worst about their finances in nearly a decade  and experts say stubborn inflation is to blame.  
In a possible blow to President Joe Bidens reelection bid, the percentage of … [+3625 chars]
